}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[[Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1]] (QCA9500) {{see also|Silex SX-PCEAN2|Acelink BR-6774AD}}
===Specifications=== *Chipset: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6320 (BB) :WiGig SiP Module, Ant Module (QCA6310) :32-Element Phased Array Antenna Module *802.11ad WiFi (WiGig) - 2GHz Bandwidth :Max data transfer rate: 4.6Gbps (AD4600) :Tx/Rx Beamforming for High Performance *Surface Mount Type (96-pin LGA Package) :M.2 1216-S3 LGA pad, [https://www.murata.com/products/productdetail?partno=MM5829-2700 Murata MM5829]
==See also== *[[Silex SX-PCEAC]] - QCA9880 3T3R 802.11ac (5GHz) • [http://www.silex.jp/products/module/sxpceac.html PPage] *[[Silex SX-PCEAC-DB]] - QCA9880 3T3R 802.11abgn/ac (2.4/5GHz) *[[Silex SX-PCEAN2]] - AR9592 2T2R 802.11abgn (2.4/5GHz) *[[Silex SX-PCEGN-BT]] - AR9485/AR3012 1T1R 802.11bgn (BT4.0) *[[Silex SX-PCEGN]] - AR9287 2T2R 802.11bgn (2.4GHz) • [http://www.silex.jp/products/module/sxpcegn.html PPage]
